content:
Move the line segment so one endpoint is at $(0, 0)$ and the other is at $(1, 1)$.

[[â˜ƒ interactive-graph 1]]

options.fullGraphAriaDescription: Interactive graph grid labeled with axis marks labeled x and y, and tick marks on whole numbers. The grid range is from -5 to 5 on both axis lines. A line segment displays initially with endpoints at (3,3) and (-2,3).
options.fullGraphAriaLabel: Interactive graph with a moveable line segment

lockedFigures.ariaLabel: Locked ellipse with a radius of 2 centered at the origin.
